Class invalid_syntax

boost::program_options::invalid_syntax

Synopsis

class invalid_syntax : public boost::program_options::error {
public:
  // construct/copy/destruct
  invalid_syntax(const std::string &, const std::string &);
  ~invalid_syntax();
  std::string tokens;
  std::string msg;
};
